column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi June - Thanks for your great review. I'm glad you were able to get seated without a wait on the weekend. Although we definitely have peak hours
column2: there are times when a party of 2-4 people can get seated immediately
column3: though it's nearly impossible to predict the timing on that. I think it has something to do with what happens when you walk into a Walgreen's and just as you finish browsing and approach the register
column4: every single person in the store decides to do the same.
